Just leave him here," she told herself, "it is  
the best shelter for him / best choice so far, not only

into a prototype with medical care." / medical care  
center.  

Just refurbish.  

The child was her secret which could be kept  
in the building hidden / buried in the forest  
/ shadowed by the trees / out of which the
